mapper.insert: insert into anymore_fileupload(fno, uuid, uploadpath, uploaddate, fileName, filetype, product_num) values (seq_NoticeFile.nextval, #{uuid}, #{uploadPath},sysdate, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{product_num})
mapper.select: select * from anymore_fileupload where uploadpath = to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy\\mm\\dd')
